title: Cran-Orange Punch
ingredients: ['1 gal. cranberry juice', '1 gal. orange juice']
directions: ['Mix juice and serve over ice cream.', 'A sprig of fresh mint completes this beverage.', 'Yield:', '2 gallons.']

title: Simple Punch
ingredients: ['1 large can pineapple juice', '1 large can orange juice', '1 large bottle apple juice']
directions: ['Mix and keep in refrigerator; before serving, add 1 quart ginger ale.', 'Stir well.']
